import React, {Component} from 'react'; import {Container, Row, Col, Card} from 'react-bootstrap'; import Header from '../Header'; import logo_bootstrap from '../assets/bootstrap-logo.png'; import logo_react from '../assets/react-logo.png'; import github from '../assets/github.png'; import adobe_xd from '../assets/adobe-xd.png'; import whimsical from '../assets/whimsical.png'; import invision from '../assets/invision.png'; import github_grey from '../assets/github-grey.png'; import youtube_grey from '../assets/youtube-grey.png'; import dribble_grey from '../assets/dribble-grey.png'; import instagram_grey from '../assets/instagram-grey.png'; import bali from '../assets/bali-card.jpg'; import undraw_1 from '../assets/undraw_1.png'; import undraw_2 from '../assets/undraw_2.png'; import undraw_3 from '../assets/undraw_3.png'; import $ from 'jquery'; class Home extends Component { componentDidMount() { $("a[href^='#']").click(function(e) { e.preventDefault(); var position = $($(this).attr("href")).offset().top - 50; $("body, html").animate({ scrollTop: position }, 500); }); } render(){ document.title="Anshor's portfolio" return (


"Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works."

Hi!

I'M ANSHOR

A FRON'T END DEVELOPER

SKILLS



Framework using

Tools

PROJECTS

Here's some projects that i've build

Beautiful Bali A landing page about Bali. Made with HTML, CSS, and Javascript. Using Bootsrap, Font-awesome and Jquery to make page more beautiful and interactive Coming Soon ... Coming Soon ... Coming Soon ...

Get in touch

Let me know if you need something

anshorje@gmail.com
); } } export default Home;
